title: Naomi Klein Book
content:
Anyone knowes which typefaces were used for this cover:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019085311im_/http:/typophile.com/files/noamiklein_3477.jpg)
author: jawbox

comments.content: Knockout for the sans. Is it just me or is typography.com _really_ slow since the relaunch?

For the Caps I’d say Knockout No. 48 Featherweight by H&FJ.

[EDIT: I’m so late.]
I wouldn't mind seeing that serif italic from up close.
